rows.label: qev050606_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ha! Fighting as you suggested made her turn tail and
flee in no time! You are truly a skilled warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0003
rows.name:
Come. We will corner her at the mouth of Mount
M'gando and finish this for good and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0004
rows.name:
We will claim vengeance for the lives of our mother
and father![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0005
rows.name: The queen jacul is here! But she... She...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0006
rows.name:
She consumed Da Naguth and Da Zeulbe!
They are dead! Both of my brothers are dead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0007
rows.name:
We fought exactly as you said, but it did not work...
None of it worked! What did we do wrong?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_SEL0011
rows.name: Admit that you may have been mistaken.

rows.label: qev050606_SEL0021
rows.name: Stand fast to the advice that you gave.

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0008
rows.name:
...It is not your fault. We were wrong to believe it
without question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0009
rows.name:
Damnation and ruin! Why did we have to believe the
words of a stranger?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0010
rows.name: Then why has this happened, dammit?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0011
rows.name:
Nothing we did made it so much as flinch.
It just kept coming. It...tore my brothers' Skells apart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0013
rows.name:
She returns! I will lure her to the mouth
of Mount M'gando![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0014
rows.name:
Getting her there may be all I am able to manage.
If so, you must do the rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050606_MSG0015
rows.name:
Please, human. That thing has stolen all from me.
Tear it limb from limb, crush its skull underfoot,
and dance upon its lifeless cadaver![ST:wait ]
